io.spine.server.entity

Class EventDispatchingRepository<I,E extends AbstractEntity<I,S>,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.entity.Repository<I,E>
      • io.spine.server.entity.RecordBasedRepository<I,E,S>
        • io.spine.server.entity.DefaultRecordBasedRepository<I,E,S>
          • io.spine.server.entity.EventDispatchingRepository<I,E,S>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.spine.logging.Logging, MessageDispatcher<io.spine.core.EventClass,io.spine.core.EventEnvelope,java.util.Set<I>>, MulticastDispatcher<io.spine.core.EventClass,io.spine.core.EventEnvelope,I>, EventDispatcher<I>, ExternalDispatcherFactory<I>, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProcessManagerRepository, ProjectionRepository

    public abstract class EventDispatchingRepository<I,E extends AbstractEntity<I,S>,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
extends DefaultRecordBasedRepository<I,E,S>
implements EventDispatcher<I>
    Abstract base for repositories that deliver events to entities they manage.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  EventDispatchingRepository.AbstractExternalEventDispatcher
      An abstract base for the external message dispatchers, enabling the EventDispatchingRepository instances to handle external events.

      • getEventRouting

        protected final EventRouting<I> getEventRouting()
        Obtains the EventRouting schema used by the repository for calculating identifiers of event targets.

      • onRegistered

        public void onRegistered()
        The callback called by a BoundedContext during the registration of the repository.

        Caches Column definitions of the Entity class managed by this repository.

        Registers itself with the EventBus of the parent BoundedContext.

        Overrides:
        onRegistered in class RecordBasedRepository<I,E extends AbstractEntity<I,S>,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message>

      • dispatch

        public final java.util.Set<I> dispatch(io.spine.core.EventEnvelope envelope)
        Dispatches the event to the corresponding entities.

        If there is no stored entity with such an ID, a new one is created and stored after it handles the passed event.

        Specified by:
        dispatch in interface MessageDispatcher<io.spine.core.EventClass,io.spine.core.EventEnvelope,java.util.Set<I>>
        Parameters:
        envelope - the event to dispatch
        Returns:
        ID(s) of entities to which the message was dispatched
